review: The fire stick got here the next day and it was super easy to install. My Dad (in his 70's) could have done it himself.I would highly recommend it to everyone. I think it is a great price for all that you get with your amazon prime membership.My son (in his 20's) loves the Fire box so much he doesn't want cable in his room anymore!
author: Mish

review: Very sad that TWC app did not work (even after side-loading) - trying to get TWC to work with this was a trip down the rabbit-hole of frustration.  In the end, I bought a Roku for the tv I wanted the TWC App for (no issues here, quick setup & dl then it just *worked*) and threw the Fire Stick on my tv already hooked up to the cable box just so I could get Netflix without having my Wii hooked up.
author: Terrie

review: Awesome. Love the interface and the apps
author: Bryan A. Ramirez

review: This is my second Fire TV Stick.  Would say the first one works perfectly.  This second unit's remote control has stopped working after a week, and even swapping batteries, no luck getting it to work.  Fortunately there is a mobile app that can be used to navigate the device if you have already set it up on the wifi network.
author: K.C.

review: Love my Fire TV stock.  It takes me forever to decide on new technology and I'm glad I didn't wait any longer.  I am an Amazon Prime member and that makes the content even better.
author: Jean J.

review: We loved it so much that we bought a 2nd one!
author: Melissa Garcia "The Consumer Queen"

review: The Fire TV Stick was easy to set up and use. My only problem was with my existing Amazon password, which I had to reset several times. I'm not sure where the problem was, but once that hurdle was crossed everything was easy. I am really enjoying my Fire Stick. It is well worth the money.
author: Cheryl McEwen

review: Sad because i was really excited about it but when i tried to use it i found out u have to buy just about everything and it really only works in the US. So the put in your pocket n carry anywhere is not accurate. Back to using my android box.
author: Reno Rankine

review: When cable got ridiculously expensive, I opted for the Fire Stick. We had a few issues getting a clear wifi signal, but once we did, setup was easy. Works great... But a word of caution. If your wifi is overloaded with devices, you may have issues.
author: DJ Lowery
